name: Warboss
abilities_raw: Warboss: +10 Melee Accuracy and +15% Melee Damage to the Warboss and allies within 2 tiles.
Attack Squig: 0 AP 35 dmg with 3 armor piercing, cd of 2. Range 1.

name: Big Mek
abilities_raw: Big Mekaniak: Range 1. Repair 30 HP and grant +1 Armor for 2 turns to an ally vehicle. Cooldown 1.
Kustom Force Field: Decrease damage received by Big Mek by -20% and ranged damage received by allies within 2 tiles by 10%.
Armor Boosta: Affects a single non-vehicle ally in an adjacent tile: +1 Ranged Armor, +10 Evasion. Expires in 2 turns. Cooldown 2.

name: Weirdboy
abilities_raw: Jabbin Fingerz: 1 enemy within 5 tiles gets -40% accuracy, -10 Evasion. Expires in 3 turns. Cooldown 3.
Warpath: All allies within 2 tiles +15% damage, -10% damage received. Expires in 2 turns. Cooldown 3.
Eadbanger: Fires a bolt of psychic energy that does 60-80 dmg with 7 armor penetration.

name: Burna Boyz
abilities_raw: Mob Rule: +10% Momentum Gains
Pyromaniaks: +15% Momentum Gains. -50% Unspent Action Momentum Penalty. Expires in 2 Turns.

name: Meganobz
abilities_raw: Mob Rule: +10% Momentum Gains
Hit 'Em Harder: +10 Melee Accuracy, +25% Melee Damage, +5% Melee Damage Received. Expires in 1 Turn. Cooldown 3.

name: Nobz
abilities_raw: Mob Rule: +10% Momentum Gains.
Hit 'Em Harder: Affects Casting Unit. +10 Melee Accuracy. +25% Melee Damage, +5% Basic Melee Damage Received. Expires in 1 Turn. Cooldown 3.

name: Painboy
abilities_raw: Sawbonez: 85% chance to heal an adjacent non-vehicle for 35 HP per model. On failure, a single model in the unit takes 11-15 HP damage

name: Lootaz
abilities_raw: Mob Rule: +10% Momentum Gains
Might Iz Right: Makes a ranged attack with an addtional 50% shots and +1 Armor Piercing.

name: Flash Gitz
abilities_raw: Mob Rule: +10% Momentum Gains
Flashy Krumpin': The unit sacrifices all of its remaining movement points, and makes a ranged attack command with 1 additional attack for every MP spent. Cooldown 3

name: Deff Dread
abilities_raw: Volatile: Explode upon death, dealing 52-70 dmg with 3 armor piercing to all units in 1 tile.
Dread Mob: Stacks when within 2 tiles of other Dreads, up to 2x. +20% shots, +10% melee damage, +1 movement.

name: Stormboyz
abilities_raw: Mob Rule: +10% Momentum Gains
Rokkit Pak: +2 Movement, -15% Ranged Accuracy, Ignore Movement Penalties from Terrain. 1 Turn, Cooldown 2
Stormboyz Strike: +2 Movement, -15% Ranged Accuracy. Expires in 1 Turn, Cooldown 3.

name: Warbiker
abilities_raw: Volatile: Explode upon death, dealing 37-50 dmg with 3 armor piercing to all units in 1 tile.
Cloud of Smoke: +15 Evasion. Expires in 2 turns. Cooldown 3.
Big Red Button: +2 Mov, +10 Evasion, -3 Ranged Stability. Expires in 1 turn, Cooldown 3.

name: Deffkopta
abilities_raw: Volatile: Explode upon death, dealing 37-50 dmg with 3 armor piercing to all units in 1 tile.
Hover: Allows moving over short obstacles and ignore movement penalties from terrain.
Big Bomb: Fly over a target and drop a big bomb that does 30-40 damage at AP 4, plus an additional 15-20 damage at AP 2 to adjacent tiles.

name: Boyz
abilities_raw: Mob Rule: +10% Momentum Gains
Stikkbombz: Deal 26-35 splash damage to a single enemy unit within 3 tiles. Armor Piercing 2. Cooldown 2.
Get Stuck In: Affects Casting Unit. +2 Ranged Damage. +50% Melee Damage Taken. Expires in 1 Turn. Cooldown 3.
